text: @Alyssa_Milano @realDonaldTrump SENDING  PRAYERS TO ALL THE AMERICAN PEOPLE  WHO HAVE LOSS FAMILY MEMBERS DUE TO  THE COVID-19 VIRUS, ALMOST 52,000. AT THIS RATE WE MIGHT CATCH OR SURPASS THE  80,000 AMERICANS WHO DIED FROM THE FLU LAST WINTER.
